content: a fully reversible lace scarf using a lace pattern modified from the zigzag eyelet pattern in barbara walker s first treasury of knitting patterns the design creates alternating vertical columns of stockinette and reverse stockinette the lace patterning is worked in the knit stitches on every row make it narrower/wider and/or shorter/longer by working fewer or more repeats of the 14-stitch/10-row lace pattern perfect for 75 to 100 grams of lace-weight or fingering-weight yarn my sample scarf is 9 1/2-in wide by 72-in long and used 71 grams of lace-weight yarn ~486 yds/444 m
